description: BOC Flex is your ultimate all-in-one banking solution! Enjoy seamless financial management with secure and flexible services at your fingertips. Easily transfer funds, pay bills, recharge mobiles, and make QR code payments anytime, anywhere. Keep track of expenses, manage multiple accounts, apply for loans, open new accounts, set up fixed deposits, and schedule payments with ease. With biometric authentication and real-time transaction alerts, BOC Flex ensures your banking experience is faster and safer than ever before.

Unlock the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading with Bybit

Join 78 million users to experience seamless, secure and reliable cryptocurrency trading. Trade, manage and grow your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency portfolio today with our simple and innovative platform. No matter if you're a beginner or a professional, or eyeing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) or other major cryptocurrencies, we're here to make your trading seamless, secure and reliable.

Bitcoin and crypto trading simplified
Our mission is to simplify the purchase of popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Polkadot (DOT), PEPE. Mantle (MNT), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Hedera (HBAR). Trade Spot and Derivatives pairs easily with fiat or cryptocurrency, including BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT and XRPUSDT contracts.

Our trading features
- Derivatives trading: Trade Perpetuals, Futures and Options seamlessly with advanced risk management tools.
- Spot trading: Enjoy features like Take Profit/Stop Loss (TP/SL) to maximize your trading efficiency. 
- Easy trade: Capture opportunities in the fast-moving Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency market with ease.
- Large trades & positions tracking: Track large Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades with real-time updates. 
- Bybit Card: Spend your Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), USDT and other cryptos at millions of merchants worldwide online and in-store to earn up to 10% cashback in crypto.
- Bybit Pay: Send or spend Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other crypto instantly—with zero gas fees and fast, secure settlement.
- Bybit Alpha: Seamless entry into the world of on-chain trading—bridging Bybit users to DeFi, NFTs and dApps through a fully integrated Web3 ecosystem.
- Bybit asset management: Build your portfolio with tools like Bybit Savings and Liquidity Mining and maximize your gains from Bitcoin (BTC) to newly-listed cryptocurrencies. 
- Copy Trading: Follow expert traders and apply their strategies in your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades. 
- Bybit NFT Marketplace: Buy, sell or trade NFTs with ease in an expanding marketplace.

Why choose Bybit for your Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trades?

Instant crypto trading
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) PEPE and other crytpocurrencies instantly using credit cards, bank transfers or other payment methods.

Optimized experience
Our streamlined UX for Spot and Derivatives trading makes trading Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other cryptocurrencies easier than ever.

Seamless deposits and transfers
Transfer major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and Ripples (XRP) quickly across multiple wallets with full customization options.

Portfolio diversification
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), PEPE and other cryptocurrencies on Spot or Derivatives markets, with leveraged tokens, crypto loans and margin trading on offer.

Our official channels
Bybit Announcement Center: https://announcement.bybit.com
Bybit Blog: https://blog.bybit.com/en-us 
Bybit Learn: https://learn.bybit.com Bybit Help: https://bybit.com/en/help-center

Join our community
X: https://twitter.com/Bybit_Official 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bybit/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bybit_official/ 
Telegram: https://t.me/BybitEnglish

Banking with Combank Digital is fast, simple, and secure. Open an account within few seconds to
experience banking designed to fit your lifestyle.
As well as updating the design and adding new functionality, we’ve worked hard to streamline the app
and make it easy to use. We’ll continue improving the app and gradually adding new features.
Feel free to leave a comment and tell us what you’d like to see!

Key Features:

Log in securely with or without your Secure Key. To log in quickly, you can now use Fingerprint on
eligible devices.
View payment card information, such as withdrawal and spending limits. You can also report your
lost or stolen card directly from the app.
Open an account within few seconds directly from your phone. No long lines, no paperwork, no
fuss.
Achieve your short and long-term financial goals with Spaces. Set savings targets and transfer
money with a single swipe.
Receive instant notifications on all account activity so you know what’s happening with your
account in real-time.
Balance Inquiry, View account history
Pay your bills, Manage your funds, Open other account, FD account creation and other main
financial services.
Locating our service points and ATM
Information on interest rates / currency details of our products
Our latest promotional and offers

Who we are,

Commercial Bank is the largest private bank in Sri Lanka, and the only Sri Lankan bank to be ranked among
the world’s top 1000 banks for many successive years. The Bank operates a network of 250+ computerlinked service points and the country’s single largest ATM network of 600+ terminals. The Bank has been
adjudged ‘Best Bank in Sri Lanka’ for 15 consecutive years by ‘Global Finance’ Magazine and has won
multiple awards as the country’s best bank from ‘The Banker,’ ‘FinanceAsia,’ ‘Euromoney’ and ‘Trade
Finance’ magazines.

Welcome to Peoples Pay, The greatest payment & mobile banking app ever created. 
Peoples Pay helps you manage your financial life hassle-free, We have designed the app for humans. It is super easy to manage your payments & finances. 

Human-Friendly Interface

Virtual Wallet

Fully Digital Account Opening

Mobile Reloads & Bill Payments

Send Money & Transfers

Card Payments & QR Payments  

Activate Services & Make yourself home

See the History & Share Receipts

Dispute management within the app No more call center waitings

Self Manage All Aspects of your finances

We don't bite you with Notifications. 

We value your feedback peoplespay@peoplesbank.lk

With HNB Digital Banking application now you can check your account balance and transaction anytime and anywhere  conveniently via your mobile phone. It's simple, easy and will  save you precious time when it comes to taking control of all your accounts. You can simply register by validating with your debit card and PIN or you can visit any of our branch to activate the service

As the leading internet banking solution in Sri Lanka, trusted by over one million users, we consistently strive to enhance your experience and make your daily transactions safer, faster and easier.
The Sampath Vishwa app embraces the future of internet banking and our new look and feel will do just that.


Features to look out for;
•	Featuring an enhanced user experience with a whole new interface
•	Ability to login with Biometrics (Face ID, Fingerprint)
•	Perform transactions with biometrics.
•	Tag your frequent payees and billers as favorites
•	Payments to favorites in no time
•	New quick actions space
•	New experience in messaging
•	Repeat transactions feature
•	Easy access to your accounts and cards
•	Full and partial loan settlements
•	Change per transaction limit of your card
•	360 degree view of your credit card transactions
•	Open and close Fixed Deposits online real time
•	Device management and many more….



Simply login using your existing Vishwa User ID and Password to experience the new App.

Discover our functionalities;
•	Pay your bills, save payment details and schedule future payments
•	Open Savings and Fixed Deposit accounts instantly
•	Transfer funds to any bank in real-time
•	Send money to anyone via Mobile Cash service even if the receiver doesn’t have an account with Sampath Bank
•	Obtain Web Cards online
•	Obtain instant loans against Fixed Deposits

Bank of Ceylon Smart Passbook is a mobile application which displays real time account transactions, account balance, last 15 transactions, current month statement and last month statement on iOS mobile devices. BOC Smart Passbook enables self-registration, optional login PIN and maintenance of all personal current and savings accounts statements.

Thriving towards our mission of providing reliable, innovative, customer friendly financial services, utilizing cutting edge technology and focusing continuously on productivity improvement, Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC has made a distinct mark in Sri Lankan banking operational standards while standing out for superlative service and technological superiority. 

One click for the ComBank Apps you need 

Commercial Bank now gives you the all new "ComBank" App. With this App you can download the Commercial Bank Apps that help you carry out your banking with ease and convenience unlike ever before 

ComBank RemitPlus 
ComBank e-Slip
ComBank Q+
ComBank ePassbook  

Now you can easily register with above Apps when you download the "ComBank" App.

Having pioneered the adoption of sustainable practices in the industry,  we continue to promote sustainability practices in the country which includes environmentally friendly and sustainable operations.  One such endeavor is to offer our customers with paperless banking services such as online banking, mobile banking, e-statements and e-passbook, to reduce paper use.

Based on the same philosophy, we bring you ComBank e-Slips, which is a paperless transaction method to deposit cash to your own account or to any other account of your choice.



 
Through ComBank e-Slips you can,   

Deposit Cash to Savings or Current accounts without filling cash deposit slips, irrespective of whether you are a customer or not.
Verify the details of recipient account prior to making the transaction
View e-Slips transaction history
Keep a tab of your transactions by entering your own reference (description) to identify the each transaction

All complete transactions carried out through e-Slips will receive an acknowledgement by way of an e- Receipt. 

There is no need to visit the Bank to register for ComBank e-Slips. You can just download the app and register on your own.
 
ComBank e-Slips is incorporated with One Time Password (OTP) to maximize the security of your transactions.

Commercial Bank is the largest private Bank in Sri Lanka. The Bank operates a large network of computer-linked service points and the country’s single largest ATM network. Commercial Bank is also the most awarded bank in Sri Lanka with many local and international accolades.

SOLO by HNB is a digital wallet which acts as the single solution for all retail payment requirements of consumers. This payment app will facilitate QR based payments at merchant outlets through any VISA / Master Card and JustPay platforms.

Mobile Banking 

Keep track of your finances anytime, anywhere With People’s Mobile Banking , 
you’ve got your Bank with you where ever you go. It’s ideal for banking on your Smart phone wherever you are in the world. It’s simple and saves time.

For whom?
•For any account holder of the People’s Bank 

What do you get?

•	Check your every day account balance with one simple swipe
•	Find your nearest branch or ATM via GPS
•	View upcoming payments, transfers and schedule new Payment
•	Digital Tips - Helps you make the most of your online journey with People’s Bank.
•	Top Transfers - Displays the transfers you complete most frequently so you can quickly repeat transfers with just one click​
•	Account Summary - Check your account balances and your latest transactions, also view your Loan and Credit Card Account, CASA Account, Pawning Account, Fixed Deposit details and activity inquiries all in one place.
•	Transaction History: Check your account  history & bill payment history
•	Cheque Services
•	Credit Card Summary - View and monitor your credit card spending habits with the spend distribution corner 
•	View credit card statements, including minimum payment and due date
•	Bill Payment - Pay your utility bills, insurance and more using quick bill payment mode, future date bill payment, favorite payment mode,.
•	Fund Transfer - Transfer funds between your accounts, within  People’s Bank or to other local banks using quick fund transfer mode, favorite, future dated, branch to branch (B2B) or recurring mode

Other Features:

•	Loan Calculators
•	Pension Calculators
•	Online Registration (No need to visit the Bank)
•	SMS/E-mail notifications (global & transaction level)
•	Saves time as no paperwork is involved
•	Up to date  Exchange Rates & Interest Rates
•	Minimized banking fees
•	Reset security password online
•	Secured personal account information.
•	Subscribe to paperless banking - Get your deposit or credit card statements on the cut-off date. No need to wait for Postal or Courier delivery
•	Loan & pawning - Loan & pawning repayment facility, pawning redemption request facility

Commercial Bank release the new ePassbook facility which is a mobile application which allows you to download and view your account transactions online on Apple smart phones.

The Essentials
View your real time account balance and transactions of all your accounts
Access at any time from anywhere
Check all your transactions for the last 30 days
ePassbook will be provided totally free of charge

The ePassbook facility provides you the account history of all your accounts in a similar manner of a savings passbook or a current account statement. This application provides an online-real time view of the account transactions.

 
Salient features
Allows the real-time tracking of account transactions for the last 30 days.
Account balance and the transaction history is updated and displayed online real time.

The ePassbook provides multiple account facility which acts as a single repository for all accounts enrolled, with the capability to view each account separately.

You can label multiple accounts with preferred names/codes, for easy reference. (eg: Salary /Petty Cash / Savings / Entertainement)

Provides flexibility to operate with or without a log-in password.

 

Eligibility
If you are an existing personal savings and/ or current account holder with a valid mobile number registered with the Bank, you can obtain this facility.

Even if you open a new personal savings and/or current account and has a valid Mobile Number you can request for this facility.

Joint Account holders could obtain the e-Passbook facility after submitting the written consent of all parties.

You can also access your e passbook via iPhones

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

LB CIM – So Simple. So Powerful.
Welcome to the new LB CIM App — your digital finance lifestyle companion. Reimagined with a modern design and powered by AI, LB CIM brings everything together in one secure, seamless experience.
Whether you're saving, borrowing, or making everyday payments, LB CIM puts the power of financial control in your hands.
________________________________________
Key features
• Fully digital onboarding — no branch visits required
• Open and manage fixed deposits and savings accounts from anywhere
• Apply for instant personal and business loans
• Get instant loans against your fixed deposits
• Access gold loan and business loan top-ups instantly
• Track and manage your loans, leases, and deposits
• Download your WHT certificate directly from the app
• Schedule payments and receive reminders
• Transfer funds to any bank or CIM Wallet
• Top up your CIM Wallet from your linked bank account
• Pay utility bills, reload mobile, settle credit cards, and insurance premiums
• Scan and pay securely using LankaQR
• View all your financial activity in one smart dashboard
________________________________________
Smarter lending with AI
Our AI-powered credit scoring provides real-time loan decisions and tailored offers. Apply digitally, sign digitally — get disbursed instantly.
• Loans from Rs. 25,000 upwards
• Top-ups for gold and business loans
• Repayment terms: 3 to 24 months
• 100% paperless experience
________________________________________
Eligibility
• Sri Lankan citizen aged 18+
• Minimum monthly income: Rs. 25,000
• Verified CIM Wallet account
________________________________________
Documents required
• NIC, passport, or driving license
• Proof of address
• Recent pay slips and bank statements
________________________________________
Representative loan example (24 months)
• Loan amount: Rs. 150,000
• Interest: Rs. 71,834
• Processing fee: Rs. 3,000
• Stamp duty: Rs. 150
• In-hand amount: Rs. 146,850
• Total repayable: Rs. 221,856
• Monthly installment: Rs. 9,244
• APR: 24.03%
Fees are deducted upfront. APR may vary by tenure.
________________________________________
Trusted and certified
LB CIM is developed by LB Finance PLC, licensed by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka and secured by LankaPay and TechCERT. Deposits are insured under the CBSL Deposit Insurance Scheme.
________________________________________
Award-winning fintech innovation:
• FITIS Digital Excellence Awards
• NBQSA National ICT Awards
• LankaPay Technnovation Awards
• ICSDB Excellence Awards for Sustainable & Digital Business
________________________________________
LB CIM – So Simple. So Powerful.
Your digital finance lifestyle, now in one app.

Make your QR payments seamlessly anywhere, anytime with NSB Pay. NSB Pay App is the best payment solution with QR based payments launched in Sri Lanka. 
You can make your payments happen, with just a tap of a button!
All you have to do is scan the QR, enter the amount and then, you are done! 
Your payments are processed faster through a highly secured platform. 
With NSB Pay on your phone, enjoy millions of services and exciting banking facilities at your fingertip!

NSB Pay Features:

Self-registration via the App
PIN or biometric based login
Convenient payments via QR Code
Payment on static QR 
Payment on dynamic QR
View the transaction history
Settle utility bills
Faster, secure transactions and
Unparalleled payment experience

Product of Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC, Q+ is the future of QR based payments in Sri Lanka. This app could also be used around the world and supports both Visa and MasterCard QR Code payments. This app is not restricted to merchants of any particular bank, this could be used locally and globally to process QR based payments.

Any of your COMBANK issued Credit, Debit or Prepaid card could be registered to make the payments through this app. MasterCard, Visa and Lanka Pay cards can be added to the app and you can add up to 5 cards to your app.

Payments can be done by the click of a button. All you have to do is scan the QR and enter the amount and the PIN. Payments are process fast and secure.

Transaction history inquiry can be done up to 06 months transactions. If there is a dispute about the payment transactions, such as duplicate posting, you can raise the dispute through the app.

Avoid the everyday hassle of cash and card transactions! Just approve the transaction on your mobile to Transfer or Request money instantly and to make real time payments to Sri Lanka’s leading Service Providers. iPay users can make payments to our merchant network which is 5,000+ and fast growing island wide.

Use biometric verification to authenticate all your transactions. iPay is safer than Cash, its safer than Cards!

The security of your data is our priority! iPay Data Centers are ISO 27001:2013 certified and we don’t share your data with external parties.

Start using iPay today and enjoy the convenience of digital transactions.

Seylan Mobile Banking app, enjoy greater convenience, do your financial transactions on the go with your mobile and enjoy a universe of financial facilities at your fingertip.

Explore our new platformto discover the benefits of Mobile Banking and a fast and easy way to operate your accounts, credit cards and other financial instruments you own.

Simply download or update the App and use the existing User ID and Password already issued to you for Seylan Internet Banking to do your financial transactions.

If you do not have a user account please use the ‘Register” option on the Seylan Online Banking login page to self-onboard to this facility.


Key Features


- Featuring an enhanced user experience with a whole new interface
- Ability to login with Biometrics (Face ID, Fingerprint)

- Ability to continue with your existing password even after exceeding 45 days, similar to internet
   banking

And also this app will facilitate you to:

Carry out Balance Inquiry, View account/credit card transaction history, Transfer funds to Seylan accounts or any other bank accounts, Pay your bills, Credit card settlements, Open saving accounts,Place Fixed Deposits and other financial services , Locating our service points and ATM CDM & CDKs,information on interest rates, details of our products and our latest promotional offers and just few additions along a quick contact option to inquire on any other matter.

Call us on our 24 Hours Customer service Hotline +94112008888 for details or visit www.seylan.lk

The all-new genie is the coolest place to take control of every aspect of your finances. Manage your money better every day with our ever-growing portfolio of financial services on your phone. Genie is powered by Dialog and ensures that all transactions are accurate and secure.

Make contactless payments with LANKAQR using multiple payment options:

Scan & Pay at any LANKAQR enabled merchant (over the counter and online) with your bank accounts and eZ Cash wallet saved with your favorite nicknames.

Save as you spend for the Things That Matter:

Discover the best ways to save with the Dialog Finance savings account. Open a digital savings account with us in just a few minutes and manage your money digitally.

Get a Mastercard you control:

Control your card’s security by freezing your card when you need, setting spending limits and more from within the app. Use your card online or at any Mastercard merchant or ATM anywhere in the world.

Save Smarter to Reach Your Goals Faster:

Make it happen by creating a dedicated goal-based Savings Account in quickly to achieve your goals easily.

Digital Fixed Deposits:

With genie Digital Fixed Deposits from Dialog Finance PLC, you can easily place your fixed deposits from anywhere you are. With our flexible mobile application “genie,” you can conveniently monitor your interest earnings and maturity information. Whilst ensuring top-notch service and security for your investment, Dialog Finance offers competitive rates to ensure your investments grow.

Buying and selling stocks has never been easier:

Digitally create a stock trading account, invest in any security listed at the Colombo Stock Exchange and manage your portfolio conveniently.

Manage Your Money, Grow Your Wealth:

Grow your wealth by investing in Mutual Funds straight from your mobile no matter where you are. One mutual fund can invest in hundreds—sometimes thousands—of individual securities at once. The fund is managed by experts who will ensure your returns are optimized. 
Bill payments made easier:

Pay to over 90+ billers conveniently and pay all your bills in one go. You can check the outstanding bill value for all your Dialog bills before you pay. Pay your Utility bill payments, Leasing payments, Mobile bill payments & reloads, Membership club payments, Insurance payments and many more.

Dream Phone come true:

With Lesi Pay Device Loans, selected Dialog mobile users can get a wide range of mobile phones and tablets from world renowned brands on convenient monthly instalment schemes. 
Check the availability of the device of your choice based on your eligibility, reserve them and be assured you get the exact same device when you visit the Dialog Axiata outlet when you utilize the Lesi pay (Device loan) facility.

Settling your Dialog bills made eZ with instant credit:

Introducing Lesi Credit where you can utilize the grant against selected Dialog Services (pay your Dialog Mobile/DTV/HBB bills etc) or top up your eZ cash wallet and repay the loan based on the stipulated monthly installments.

eZ cash with ease:

Now you can register and open or link your eZ Cash wallet to genie and access mobile money at anytime from anywhere to make a range of transactions including send money. You can create a classic wallet with Rs.10,000 per day transaction limit and also simply top up via other bank accounts through genie when needed. 

Instant notifications:

Think instant spending notifications on where your money is spent and for what. Pretty neat, right?

Security the way you want it:

If you lose or misplace your Dialog Finance ATM card, just freeze/unfreeze it from within the app.
Payments done through your genie account are protected by multi-layer security steps like fingerprint or PIN authentication per transaction, to keep payments accurate and secure. Now, you can make safe and secure payments in seconds knowing your card or account information is secure.

This Digital Wallet allows you to perform all your payments and manage your funds in your own time and space. 

Key Features of WePay : 



Opening a WePay Wallet is simple and straightforward.

All Sri Lankan citizens over 18 years can receive this service whether you are a Sampath Bank customer or not. Those who are not Sampath Bank customers can add their own bank Credit/Debit Cards and accounts to the WePay Wallet. 

You can top up your virtual card via the app, anytime you want to make a payment. 

You can keep all your Credit/ Debit Cards and accounts saved in the WePay App   and instantly check your Sampath Bank balance before making payments. 

You can make utility bill payments to over 130 billers from any of your Credit Cards, Debit Cards or accounts.

You can make payments at our merchant outlets using QR and enjoy special promotional offers to enhance your shopping experience.

You can use social share option to send and receive money to/from anyone via any social media platform such as WhatsApp, Viber, Facebook. Twitter, SMS, Email, etc. 

WePay Merchant Facility  : 

If you are an entrepreneur running a business, give your customers the freedom to broaden their payment modes by accepting Credit and Debit Cards.

Become a WePay merchant and boost your sales while enjoying lower commission rates. 


Stay up to date with all bank promotions and enjoy exciting benefits offered by Sampath Bank.

SmartPay is a digital lifestyle service platform in Sri Lanka that helps you to manage your finances, digitally. The App facilitates Peer-to-Peer fund transfers between any Sri Lankan banks using an Account number or SmartPay fund transfer QR. You can pay to a wide range of billers, Scan any LankaQR at any Merchant location and receive Lanka QR or China Union Pay QR Merchant Payments rapidly.

With SmartPay, now you’re free to,
-Add any Bank Current or Savings account in Sri Lanka as a payment instrument.
-Complete any Utility bill payment, in a matter of seconds.
-Fund transfers from any local bank to another bank in real-time.
-Scan and Pay at over 100,000 LANKAQR-certified merchant outlets islandwide with your mobile and without cash in hand.
-Scan and Pay to any LANKAQR Code printed on a utility bill or a merchant invoice
-Settle BOC Credit Cards quickly, avoiding additional fees or charges.
-Inquire about balances of your BOC Savings or Current accounts in real time
-View a mini statement of your registered Bank of Ceylon Accounts
